Email Contact Info: Webmaster & Moderators
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Office Of The Mayor: Read This Section First!: Email Contact Info: Webmaster & Moderators
By Lisa Shock on Monday, May 6, 2002 - 07:36 pm:

This site is wholely owned and run by Lisa Shock.

We do not handle any game related questions via email.
We expect everyone to post questions on the MRM message board.
We do not accept CD list submissions via email.
Do NOT add any of us to any sort of email list!


Omni Strunks is the Birthday Herald, responsible for the official Happy Birthday posts in the Cafe. Instructions for getting on the Birthday List are in the Library, inside the list itself.

Other Moderators are listed in the Contact link on the left side of the MRM site. These people have specific duties and privileges within particular portions of the board, not the entire site, and therefore may not be involved in day-to-day issues.

Please note that some old messages at this site may have Lisa Shock's email listed as "lisashock@ignmail.com". This email account is no longer valid, please do not attempt to use it!
